title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck

reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's soft cable knit texture and find it well-made, comfortable, and warm for winter.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh my gosh, this sweater!
items.body: I love it. It’s so soft and almost silky feeling. It’s one of the nicest sweaters I’ve ever gotten through an Amazon seller and it’s gotten me many compliments. So warm! The best winter sweater you can get here. I love an oversized fit and at 5’5” and 140 lbs. this is perfect for me. Wearing the XL, I can fit a button down shirt underneath, with room to spare. Lovely and classic in that Annie Hall ‘wearing my husband’s sweater’ way, and so, so comfortable. I got it in the gray, which is a slightly unusual gray in that it leans towards brown. For me, this works out just fine, because I’m wearing it with brown pants and boots 99% of the time but by all means, do be aware. It’s yet *another* item where the color is not represented properly in the photos and apart from sizing jank—not an issue here—is *the* most frustrating issue on Amazon. As with *all* clothing items purchased on Amazon—frankly I don’t care what they are—you wash it in cold water on the delicate cycle and you lay it on a drying rack, or you can use the air dry setting (without heat) in your dryer. You have zero guarantees about shrinkage with anything you buy here, but doing this will keep your purchases looking good as long as is possible. I like this so much that I’m thinking of picking it up in another colorway. It’s that’s terrific. Read more
items.author: bellini trice

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You'll want multiples of this sweater!
items.body: 2nd one I've purchased, and lover the brown color - pairs great with jeans and loafers - but could easily dress it up or down. It has a super soft fabric on the inside and is dreamy to wear. It's so soft and has a good weight to it. You can layer or wear alone (I wear it alone) and it's warm. I was very pleased with the great quality of the sweater, and the design. Appears to be a higher end sweater versus what I paid for it. It washes easily, and retains its shape. No pilling or fuzz at all, and I've washed it several times (I do, however, hang it to air dry). The sleeves are long on me, so they can appear to be oversized or I turn the cuffs (I'm 5'10") and the hem hits at the top of my thigh (so covers the butt). Both of the colors I own are favorites and I wear them weekly! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, beautiful, and fits perfectly
items.body: love my new sweater. I'm 5'4, 145, with a 36" bust and bought a medium and it fits perfectly. I am petite so it did not run short for me. It is so soft, warm and perfect for layering or over leggings. The soft pink as pictured is exact. The delivery is very long. Read more
items.author: Joan M. McNamara

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but doesn’t fit as pictured
items.body: Overall, I think the sweater is nice— I’ll probably keep it. Very soft and appears well made for the price. One star off because it’s much shorter and the collar fits different than pictured. I was going for the oversized look in the picture which didn’t materialize. The reviews said it runs large so I ordered my normal size. I’m going to order one size up and compare. Read more
items.author: Christine Anne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, cozy and warm
items.body: This sweater is so soft, warm and cozy. It’sa great length as well, covers much of my rather large bum but it’s also not too long and therefore it doesn’t look sloppy. I like the opening for my head cause it doesn’t mess my hair up from its messy bun. I definitely want to get more in different colors so I have some nice cozy things to wear that make me look nice and put together when I go out instead of just sweats. Read more
items.author: DoahsPunk

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect oversize sweater for pairing with leggings
items.body: Very soft and perfect color. Nicely oversized. Perfect for wearing with leggings. I purchased the recommended size based on my past purchases and it was perfect. Nice and roomy for layering beneath it like shown in the picture. Would definitely get it in another color. Read more
items.author: nc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow this is such an awesome sweater.
items.body: Holy cow what a comfortable soft beautiful sweater. It recommended I get 2x which is great for leggings. I’m going to get the xl in another color for jeans. This is the most comfortable sweater I ever put on. Read more
items.author: Jenni Devore

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and stylish!
items.body: The chunky knit gives the "chouyatou Women's Winter Chunky V Neck Long Sleeve Loose Cable Knit Sweater Pullover" a comfortable, laid-back vibe, and it feels warm and cozy, making it ideal for chilly days. The cable-knit texture gives it a more fashionable appearance than a simple sweater, and its loose fit and V-neck make it easy to wear alone or layer over shirts. I like how it strikes a good balance between comfort and carefree style, and it's adaptable enough for casual days or comfortable weekends. Read more
items.author: S. B.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Pink, Light Gray, Black, Camel, Dark Gray, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
